A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In a galaxy defined by clear-cut lines between good and evil\, The Last Jedi delivers complexity and the unexpected in characters\, relationships\, motives and the nature of the force. It's beautifully shot and breaks new ground for the franchise. If you want to pay money to watch a Star Wars film that panders to your every expectation as an uber fan then this is not your film. But if you're a fan who wants to be challenged\, or just a regular Joe wanting to be entertained\, TLJ is for you.
